availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Anna Hendricks Kremer (Jefferson County, Kentucky, resident.)

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, resident. Orleans Parish, Louisiana, native. Daughter of James Hendricks and Mary Meehan Hendricks. Married to Charles L. Kremer in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on September 6, 1857. Mother of Henry L. Kremer, Charles Kremer Jr., Mary Kremer, and Louisa E. Kremer. Resident of Jefferson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 6, p. 270.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Jefferson County Marriages, Film #000482708, p.421.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky,
Louisville, Ward 7, p. 4B.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File #1391.
